name: Droid Rush
description:
Yo I made this game in my game design class. Pretty fun.

basically a very basic RPG battle sim.

Story: 

The year is 2035, 

You are a robot sent down to defeat the newly created Space Mafia that formed as Space Donald Trump became Space President.

We have intel that the mafia boss is a cat, don't be fooled though. He's one tough animal. 

CATE :flushed:
